website_summaries.verdict: The vividly-colored Vans Yacht Club Old Skool shoes are definite eyecatchers that will guarantee some neck-breaking (not yours, but other people’s necks since they’ll be doing the head-turning) style. These are done up in the same classic style that has been beloved by generations. The shoes hide a comfortable interior that will have you wearing them every day. Price is not an issue as the kicks are surprisingly affordable. The fit is A-OK, although a little more arch support might be appreciated.
pros: Most people who reviewed the Yacht Club Old Skool by Vans are very much pleased with the beautiful and bold colors of the shoes
Many reviewers are satisfied with the comfortability of these low-top classic kicks from Vans
These new editions of the Vans Old Skools have a unique style that is “straight-up fire” according to plenty of users
Several purchasers have happily narrated that they’re receiving plenty of compliments from friends and strangers on their choice of kicks
These Vans Old Skool Yacht Club shoes match well with most outfits, some pleased buyers have reported
A good number of testers say that they highly recommend the lifestyle sneakers
A handful of consumers believe the price is affordable when you consider the quality and overall excellence of the sneakers
A few individuals have noted that these colorful versions of the Old Skools give a perfect fit width-wise
cons: Some sizes of the Vans Yacht Old Skool shoes are hard to find, a few have said
One person has remarked that these aren’t suited for skating because they’ll tear up easily

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! In my opinion they go with everything - and I've been wearing them with everything :D they're super comfortable too. I'm not sure what makes them a platform but I'm actually really happy because I didn't notice they were "platform" vans when I ordered them. The sole seems like a regular shoe to me!
customer_reviews.author: Machlan

customer_reviews.title: My son absolutely loves these, he’s in seventh grade ...
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves these, he’s in seventh grade, and I always get at least a half a size bigger for growing room. However these do you run slightly big.
customer_reviews.author: Bopper1

customer_reviews.title: Great but had to return, no fault of the seller.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately some one bought me the same shoe so I had to return this item, but it was perfect, arrived fast, and return process was easy.
customer_reviews.author: DeeW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are just gorgeous. I love powder blue anything and when I saw these I had to have them. They fit perfectly, comfort right out of the box, no breaking in required. Walked all day in these with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: A. Mebane

customer_reviews.title: Impressively cute
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking sneakers. I have not seen these in the retail stores which is what prompted my purchase. This was a birthday gift for my daughter and she truly loved it. She likes stuff that not everyone has, so this fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: BrooklynBoy

customer_reviews.title: Loved them
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes! These were my first pair of Vans & I fell in love. Definitely recommend:)
customer_reviews.author: Maryuri Quintero

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes as a gift and the person that used it for the first time noticed the yellow stain on one of the shoes. Not a happy customer!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alma Berrios

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for my teenage son who wears a size 9. Seems like a small foot for a growing boy...needless to say he loves them!
customer_reviews.author: TBrown

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. As described. Well packed. Fast shipping. Easy transaction. Very pleased. Gifted to my daughter who is very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Zonafan

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced...
customer_reviews.text: Authentic, but way over priced. You can get 2 pair for the same price. I emailed them to let them know and they said well you can refund I you want. I couldn't do that because it was a day before I was gifting the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Will Webster I

customer_reviews.title: they fit just like his others
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a birthday gift for my fiance, he absolutely adores them, they fit just like his others, and the gum bottom is a little dark but it looks really good
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: They are gray but also great
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, perfect look, color from the web page could be tricky, they are plain gray. Lot better than the traditional black.
customer_reviews.author: Erick Acuna

customer_reviews.title: Always on time!
customer_reviews.text: Great sneaker! Wears well and, of course, so many styles to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Weird sizing
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are super uncomfortable. They’re too wide and need to be broken in. But you have to be able to wear them to break them in. I wouldn’t recommend and I don’t think they’re actual Vans Brand anyway
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I ordered the wrong style so needed to return them. But service has been great.
customer_reviews.author: TommyBoy71nine

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a women’s size 7 Received a men’s size 12!!! Will return. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: jer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best style of vans out there in my opinion, super comfy and they come in grey!!
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: the tennis is perfect
customer_reviews.text: I loved it very beautiful, I hope I buy more.😍
customer_reviews.author: Ludiany Oliveira

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy as I expected! And love anything all black. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes so much
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE these shoes so much! I am a 6 1/2 but it looks like I accidentally ordered a 6. It doesn't even matter because they fit great. The color is so pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ronnan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are bad a$$! They fit perfectly! They're classic Vans.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Bock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fabrication, I was in love the moment I opened the box !!!
customer_reviews.author: sydni

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Vans never failed to make me happy with every purchase.
customer_reviews.author: NORLILAH Z.

customer_reviews.title: He loved them. They are true to any other size ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my daughters boyfriend. He loved them. They are true to any other size of Vans and fit accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Old Skool Proper
customer_reviews.text: The most comfortable pair of Vans Classics I've ever had the pleasure to wear--and I've worn a lot! The combo of canvas, suede and that dope gum sole! Great great OG pair of kicks here. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the gumsole, keeps them looking new longer than the white version.
customer_reviews.author: Drew N.

customer_reviews.title: ... was going by the vans slides but still a nice got
customer_reviews.text: Never owned a pair before should of got a smaller size I was going by the vans slides but still a nice got
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These shoes squeak every time I wear them . . . Wth!
customer_reviews.author: J-Cee

customer_reviews.title: Incorect sizing on description
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered a US size 10 and when I received my shoes they were a UK 10. The sizing chart is in US sizes. When I went to return, I had to pay out of pocket to send back and would not be reimbursed until they received the shoes back. There is no guarantee so I kept the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Maria W.

product_meta.title: Vans Old Skool, Unisex Adults’ Closed-Toe
product_meta.description: The Unisex Old Skool Yacht Club from Vans combines a Suede & Canvas upper with a durable Rubber sole. These Trainers feature Lace Up fastening, cushioned insole and Textile lining. Finished with Vans branding, the style VA38G1R1Q comes in a Blue Green colourway.
